title: Square Yard to Square Foot Converter (sq yd ⇄ sq ft)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1 square yard = 9 square feet So: area_sq_ft = area_sq_yd × 9 Example: a 12 sq yd room → 12 × 9 = 108 sq ft.
